import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { yupResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/yup"; import * as yup from "yup"; import { SignUpType } from '../../types/SignUpTypes'; import { useAppDispatch } from '../../store/storeHooks' const numberRegex = /^[0-9]+$/ const schema = yup.object().shape({ email: yup.string() .required("Please enter your email") .matches(/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,}$/i, "Please enter valid email"), password: yup.string() .required("Please enter your password") .min(8, "Password length should be greater than 8"), privacyPolicy: yup .bool() .oneOf([true], "Please check the privacy policy"), }); const SignInForm = () => { const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const signInAccount = () => { } return (
